title: La Villa Del Chef
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Beer/Wine, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Large range of cocktail, wine, and beer as well as fruit juices and coconut-based shakes. Has vegan choices. English spoken. View of beautiful sunset over Lake Peten. The owners build playgrounds for disadvantaged kids in the local community and donate food to schools. They also get involved with local environmental projects.
